revision.text: Possibly: Mentoria: or, the young ladies instructor : in familiar conversations on moral and entertaining subjects: calculated to improve young minds in the essential, as well as ornamental posts of female education / By Ann Murry. (London : Printed by Frys and Couchman for Charles Dilly, in the Poultry, M.DCC.LXXXV. [1785]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1299730~S1
